# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(text::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    lines = Vector{String}()
    current_line = ""
    for word in split(text, " ")
        if length(current_line) + length(word) <= text_width
            current_line *= "$word "
        else
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = word
        end
    end
    push!(lines, current_line)
    join(lines, "\n")
end

# 示例：
wrap_string("Hello world this is a test string with long lines that need to be wrapped at the specified width.") == "Hello world\nthis is a test\nstring with long\nlines that need\nto be wrapped\nat the specified width."
```
